Spider-Man 3 holds up better on multiple viewings. They both have a similar amount of contrivances and goofy plot cul-de-sacs but Raimi's overall aesthetic makes SM3's flaws forgivable while Nolan's gritty realism makes TDKR's flaws stand out even more. https://t.co/qOSwQhpKZt

For all the talk about Marvel being lighter and more family friendly than DC, way less of their characters seem to have a no killing rule.

By my count Spider-Man and Daredevil are the only two (in the MCU at least) who are explicitly against killing people.

A certain annoying fan base are going to need major copium when they realize their least favorite executive is actually being given a seat closer to power with Zaslav in charge. https://t.co/woDaur9kVN
